intro: Echinospermum spinocarpos, commonly known as the spiny echinoseed, is a flowering plant native to arid and semi-arid regions of South America. Echinospermum spinocarpos is adapted to survive in harsh environments, with deep root systems and reduced water loss mechanisms.
